name: Gorilla Online!
description:
GorillaOnline! is online multiplayer tag game.

  • It's a free game.
  • No forced display of ads
  • 150 seconds per game
  • More than 30 types of gorillas

Real time online survival games with friends.

When the game starts, one "survivor" is chosen from among the four players.

The gorilla wins by capturing the survivor, and the survivor wins by escaping from the gorilla until the end of the game or by collecting all the gorilla's treasures on the stage.

The gorilla must use teamwork and a variety of skills acquired by eating bananas to hunt down the survivor.

Survivors can only run away, but they can use radar to pinpoint the gorilla's location. If you can escape, you'll get a lot of coins and G-stones!

I am a Japanese game developer.

I translated this game myself because I wanted people all over the world to be able to play it.

If you find anything wrong, please let me know.

I hope you enjoy GorillaOnline!
